chunk:
Savor Beauty Lavender Milk + Honey Face Cake Mask Mix

Brand: Savor Beauty

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Kaolinite (White Clay), Dehydrated Coconut Milk powder, Honey Powder, Fragrance (100% Essential Oils)
book: 1883-Savor Beauty Lavender Milk + Honey Face Cake Mask Mix

chunk: Directions: Mix together ingredients to cake batter-like consistency in small bowl, apply onto moist face with fingers or Savor Beauty mask brush. Leave on for 3-5 minutes. Do not let dry. Remove with warm water or with moist towel. May also rinse off with warm water in the shower. May be used 1-2 times per week.
book: 1883-Savor Beauty Lavender Milk + Honey Face Cake Mask Mix

chunk: Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
book: 1883-Savor Beauty Lavender Milk + Honey Face Cake Mask Mix
